metadata.synopsis: The player has discovered a wand that will allow them to raise Mayrina's husband from the dead. Mayrina is standing by the coffin that holds her dead husband. When player raises Connor from the dead, the coffin door bursts open and he crawls out of it a zombie - unable to speak in anything other than moans and groans. Player can take the zombie as a summon, kill the zombie, or give the zombie to Mayrina.

7.speaker: Mayrina
7.context: NodeContext: Annoyed - this player has pissed you off at least once already

29.speaker: Mayrina
29.text: Gods, didn't hear you coming. I know I should head home, but I can't bring myself to leave.
29.context: NodeContext: look up from quietly crying, surprised

57.speaker: Mayrina
57.text: Gods, didn't hear you coming. I know I should head home, but I can't bring myself to leave.
57.context: NodeContext: look up from quietly crying, surprised

6.speaker: Mayrina
6.text: The thought of putting him in a wheelbarrow and making the journey all over again... *Sigh.*
6.context: NodeContext: turns back to the grave, arms crossed - then gestures to the coffin. Trying not to cry.

78.speaker: Player
78.text: I found a wand - I think I can resurrect your husband.
78.context: NodeContext: hopeful disbelief. Drop arms and stare at player.

113.speaker: Mayrina
113.context: NodeContext: hopeful disbelief. Drop arms and stare at player.

0.text: *You feel a surge of power from the wand - the air suddenly tastes acrid. It wants to be used.*
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player pulls out wand, which sparks in the player's hand

33.speaker: Narrator
33.text: *You feel a surge of power from the wand - the air suddenly tastes acrid. It wants to be used.*
33.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player pulls out wand, which sparks in the player's hand

23.speaker: Mayrina
23.text: Bring him back. Bring Connor back - please.

20.speaker: Player
20.text: Point the wand towards the coffin.
20.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player points the wand toward the grave. Door of coffin burst open. Zombie roughly stands, moaning and groaning as they stand - stepping out of it. Horrible sight, all rough movements and shuffling,NodeContext: Horror and fear

74.speaker: Mayrina
74.text: What - what's happening? Why is he still dead?
74.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player points the wand toward the grave. Door of coffin burst open. Zombie roughly stands, moaning and groaning as they stand - stepping out of it. Horrible sight, all rough movements and shuffling,NodeContext: Horror and fear

17.speaker: Narrator
17.text: *You feel something pull at you. The creature yearns - for a master.*
17.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player moves the wand around and the zombie follows the commands implied. [Jurassic Park style]NodeContext: start in kneeling position, stand up as you groan

48.speaker: Connor Vinderblad
48.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player moves the wand around and the zombie follows the commands implied. [Jurassic Park style]NodeContext: start in kneeling position, stand up as you groan

121.speaker: Mayrina
121.text: What have you done to him?!

117.speaker: Player
117.text: Huh. The creature's bound to this wand. How useful.
117.context: NodeContext: The player has called the zombie a 'thing'. The love and adoration for the man your husband once was obvious in your voice.

9.speaker: Mayrina
9.text: He's not a creature! He's my husband.
9.context: NodeContext: The player has called the zombie a 'thing'. The love and adoration for the man your husband once was obvious in your voice.

60.speaker: Mayrina
60.text: I wanted him back - back the way he was. Not this.
60.context: NodeContext: fighting back tears, gesturing at the zombie on "this"

93.speaker: Player
93.text: This is your husband - do you want him or not?
93.context: NodeContext: desperately trying to get through

56.speaker: Mayrina
56.context: NodeContext: desperately trying to get through

107.speaker: Mayrina
107.context: NodeContext: desperately trying to get through

2.speaker: Mayrina
2.text: I don't even know if he's in there.
2.context: NodeContext: You sound heartbroken as you look at the love of your life.

63.speaker: Mayrina
63.text: But he might be. And if he is, I'll find him and bring him back.

111.speaker: Player
111.text: Here's the wand. Good luck to you and Connor.
111.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player hands the wand to Mayrina

77.text: Thanks, but we'll need more than luck. A bloody miracle more like it.
77.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player hands the wand to Mayrina

24.text: Thanks, but we'll need more than luck. A bloody miracle more like it.
24.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player hands the wand to Mayrina

116.speaker: Mayrina
116.text: Thanks, but we'll need more than luck. A bloody miracle more like it.
116.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player hands the wand to MayrinaNodeContext: Grim but trying to summon her determination

91.speaker: Mayrina
91.text: I'll find a wizard or something. Maybe someone in Baldur's Gate can help us.
91.context: NodeContext: Voice soft and gentle as you think of your husband. Turn to him, this horrible zombie, at 'Remember?'/ Zombie merely stares back.

68.speaker: Mayrina
68.text: Connor always said you can find anything in that city. Remember?
68.context: NodeContext: Voice soft and gentle as you think of your husband. Turn to him, this horrible zombie, at 'Remember?'/ Zombie merely stares back.

100.speaker: Mayrina
100.context: NodeContext: Trying to be sincere - despite how awful the situation is

123.speaker: Mayrina
123.context: NodeContext: To your zombie husband. Gentle and loving tone as you gesture to go. Like to a child.

101.speaker: Mayrina
101.context: NodeContext: Absolute breakdown. You're hysterical, crying. collapse on the floor, bawling your eyes out

51.speaker: Mayrina
51.text: I thought you were going to help! I thought - I thought...
51.context: NodeContext: Absolute breakdown. You're hysterical, crying. collapse on the floor, bawling your eyes out

88.speaker: Mayrina
88.text: No! You monster! I - I won't let you!
88.context: NodeContext: You take a defensive stance.This person has murdered your brothers and now taken your husband - you're desperate and hysterical and have nothing left to lose.

72.speaker: Player
72.text: Don't worry - I have the wand. I'll make use of him.
72.context: NodeContext: You snap back to reality as you realise they're taking your husband - zombie or not, he's still your Connor. You interrupt Ethel's spell, reaching out in protest.

76.speaker: Player
76.text: We can always bury him again.
76.context: NodeContext: You snap back to reality as you realise they're taking your husband - zombie or not, he's still your Connor. You interrupt Ethel's spell, reaching out in protest.

66.speaker: Mayrina
66.text: No! Don't put him in the ground!
66.context: NodeContext: You snap back to reality as you realise they're taking your husband - zombie or not, he's still your Connor. You interrupt Ethel's spell, reaching out in protest.

21.speaker: Mayrina
21.text: He was... he is afraid of the dark.
21.context: NodeContext: Gentle and soft voice as you think of Connor.

11.speaker: Mayrina
11.text: I'll do it. I'll take him.

30.speaker: Player
30.text: No. The dead should stay dead.
30.context: NodeContext: This is softest and most loving we've seen Mayrina. She loves her husband and is gonna do everything she can to help him.

53.speaker: Mayrina
53.text: No! I won't let you put him back there.
53.context: NodeContext: This is softest and most loving we've seen Mayrina. She loves her husband and is gonna do everything she can to help him.

58.speaker: Player
58.text: He's all yours - you'll need this wand.
58.context: NodeContext: This is softest and most loving we've seen Mayrina. She loves her husband and is gonna do everything she can to help him.

97.context: NodeContext: This is softest and most loving we've seen Mayrina. She loves her husband and is gonna do everything she can to help him.

112.speaker: Mayrina
112.context: NodeContext: This is softest and most loving we've seen Mayrina. She loves her husband and is gonna do everything she can to help him.

64.speaker: Mayrina
64.text: I promised him I'd fix this. And I'm gonna. Maybe - maybe someone in Baldur's Gate can help us.
64.context: NodeContext: This is softest and most loving we've seen Mayrina. She loves her husband and is gonna do everything she can to help him.

37.speaker: Mayrina
37.text: I'll... I'll figure something out. C'mon, love. Let's... let's go.
37.context: NodeContext: Voice almost breaking on 'let's go home' as she takes the man that was once her husband back to the home they built together.

109.speaker: Player
109.text: He's already dead. Don't get in my way.
109.context: NodeContext: Player is about to kill the zombie - your husband. You scream and are about to throw yoruself in their path.

46.speaker: Mayrina
46.context: NodeContext: Player is about to kill the zombie - your husband. You scream and are about to throw yoruself in their path.

94.speaker: Player
94.text: Are you sure you want to do this?
94.context: NodeContext: This is softest and most loving we've seen Mayrina. She loves her husband and is gonna do everything she can to help him.

27.speaker: Player
27.text: I'm sorry this is how things turned out.
27.context: NodeContext: This is softest and most loving we've seen Mayrina. She loves her husband and is gonna do everything she can to help him.

83.speaker: Mayrina
83.text: No. This is my fault. And I'm - I'm gonna fix it.
83.context: NodeContext: This is softest and most loving we've seen Mayrina. She loves her husband and is gonna do everything she can to help him.

47.speaker: Player
47.text: Your husband's gone - this thing is just a monster.
47.context: NodeContext: This is softest and most loving we've seen Mayrina. She loves her husband and is gonna do everything she can to help him.

81.speaker: Mayrina
81.text: You don't know that. He - he could still be in there. And I gotta try.
81.context: NodeContext: This is softest and most loving we've seen Mayrina. She loves her husband and is gonna do everything she can to help him.

45.speaker: Mayrina
45.text: Maybe someone in Baldur's Gate can help us. Connor always said you can find anything in that city.

54.speaker: Player
54.text: Call on your god to smite the undead.

61.speaker: Player
61.text: So the hag fulfils her promise. It can never be simple, can it?
61.context: NodeContext: Fighting back tears as you realise the hag double crossed you

80.speaker: Mayrina
80.text: But this isn't what she promised!
80.context: NodeContext: Fighting back tears as you realise the hag double crossed you

52.speaker: Player
52.text: Hold on - maybe it's not permanent.

22.speaker: Mayrina
22.text: Not permanent? Bits of him are falling off.

122.speaker: Player
122.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player snaps the wand in twoNodeContext: Absolute horror, pain and fury

18.speaker: Mayrina
18.text: What have you done?! You BASTARD!
18.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~The player snaps the wand in twoNodeContext: Absolute horror, pain and fury

92.speaker: Player
92.context: NodeContext: Sad but determined - you're allowing yourself this time to grieve but you're determined to get through it. Arms crossed, not looking at player - staring at coffin.

89.speaker: Mayrina
89.text: Not even a little bit. But I will be.
89.context: NodeContext: Sad but determined - you're allowing yourself this time to grieve but you're determined to get through it. Arms crossed, not looking at player - staring at coffin.

82.speaker: Player
82.text: You could just leave him here.
82.context: NodeContext: Pain at the thought - he's been through enough. Arms crossed, not looking at player - staring at coffin.

90.speaker: Mayrina
90.text: No. He deserves a proper burial. He deserves some rest. And he won't get that here.
90.context: NodeContext: Pain at the thought - he's been through enough. Arms crossed, not looking at player - staring at coffin.

38.speaker: Player
38.text: Whining won't get you there any faster.
38.context: NodeContext: Shaking head as you look at player with anger and pity.

36.speaker: Mayrina
36.text: You're a miserable bastard, you know that?
36.context: NodeContext: Shaking head as you look at player with anger and pity.

125.speaker: Player
125.context: NodeContext: Smile and love in your voice as you talk about your husband

104.speaker: Mayrina
104.text: We were just kids when we met. Heh. I might have pushed him off a swing I wanted.
104.context: NodeContext: Smile and love in your voice as you talk about your husband

55.speaker: Mayrina
55.text: He got right up and pushed me back. I was so surprised that I just laughed. He did too.

15.speaker: Mayrina
15.text: We've barely spent a day apart since.

35.speaker: Player
35.text: I could say a prayer, if you'd like.
35.context: NodeContext: Sincere. Grateful. Trying not to cry.

26.speaker: Mayrina
26.text: Please. Connor used to say only a fool turned down the divine.
26.context: NodeContext: Sincere. Grateful. Trying not to cry.

126.speaker: Player
126.text: The weak fall to make way for the strong - and the Dark One smiles.
126.context: NodeContext: Player has said a cruel prayer you're horrified and shocked - quickly turning to anger.

85.speaker: Player
85.text: Chaff for the Reaper's harvest. May his bleached bones march in your host, great Myrkul.
85.context: NodeContext: Player has said a cruel prayer you're horrified and shocked - quickly turning to anger.

96.speaker: Player
96.text: Vermin dies as vermin lived. Good riddance.
96.context: NodeContext: Player has said a cruel prayer you're horrified and shocked - quickly turning to anger.

67.speaker: Player
67.text: You died as you lived - pathetically and without purpose.
67.context: NodeContext: Player has said a cruel prayer you're horrified and shocked - quickly turning to anger.

8.speaker: Player
8.text: Another reminder of mortal fragility. I am grateful for this gift.
8.context: NodeContext: Player has said a cruel prayer you're horrified and shocked - quickly turning to anger.

4.speaker: Mayrina
4.text: What in the hells was that?
4.context: NodeContext: Player has said a cruel prayer you're horrified and shocked - quickly turning to anger.

71.speaker: Player
71.text: May you dance beneath the boughs - happy and free.
71.context: NodeContext: Player has said a prayer that has made you feel much better. Sincere thanks as you hold back tears.

95.speaker: Player
95.text: A beloved husband and father - his vigil is ended, great Guardian.
95.context: NodeContext: Player has said a prayer that has made you feel much better. Sincere thanks as you hold back tears.

5.speaker: Player
5.text: You suffered and endured - may the Broken One shoulder your burdens, that you might walk free.
5.context: NodeContext: Player has said a prayer that has made you feel much better. Sincere thanks as you hold back tears.

40.speaker: Player
40.text: You join the same path as all those before - may Kelemvor guide your steps.
40.context: NodeContext: Player has said a prayer that has made you feel much better. Sincere thanks as you hold back tears.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: Light wanes only to wax again - and though life fades, memory shall not.
3.context: NodeContext: Player has said a prayer that has made you feel much better. Sincere thanks as you hold back tears.

25.speaker: Mayrina
25.context: NodeContext: Player has said a prayer that has made you feel much better. Sincere thanks as you hold back tears.

108.speaker: Player
108.text: Where there is peace, may you have it. Where there is comfort, may those you love know it.
108.context: NodeContext: The player has said some harsh words that have made you cry even harder - the full reality of your grief hittin gyou.

31.speaker: Player
31.text: This man's death came too soon. See to it, Wounded Tyr, that he find some justice beyond the grave.
31.context: NodeContext: The player has said some harsh words that have made you cry even harder - the full reality of your grief hittin gyou.

49.speaker: Mayrina
49.text: Gods. Why wasn't it me? Connor...
49.context: NodeContext: The player has said some harsh words that have made you cry even harder - the full reality of your grief hittin gyou.

73.speaker: Player
73.text: Quietly whisper a blessing for protection. May Mayrina and her child suffer no harm.
73.context: NodeContext: Annoyed at yourself as you sturggle to hold back tears. Just about keeping it together

65.speaker: Mayrina
65.text: I miss him. Every moment of every day. Godsdammit.
65.context: NodeContext: Annoyed at yourself as you sturggle to hold back tears. Just about keeping it together

115.speaker: Player
115.text: Wife without husband, child without father - Dark Lady, two more know the loss of your embrace.

86.speaker: Mayrina
86.text: I'm sorry. I'm sorry I couldn't bring you back.

69.speaker: Mayrina
69.text: I can't believe it didn't work. That all of this was for nothing.
69.context: NodeContext: Trying not to cry - feeling hopeless and exhausted

114.speaker: Mayrina
114.text: I can't believe it didn't work. That all of this was for nothing.
114.context: NodeContext: Trying not to cry - feeling hopeless and exhausted

119.speaker: Mayrina
119.text: Gods, don't creep up on people.
119.context: NodeContext: Annoyed and frustrated. Looks up from quietly crying

124.speaker: Mayrina
124.text: I'll be out of your hair soon. I just... can't bring myself to leave.

120.speaker: Mayrina
120.text: You said you can resurrect my husband? Bring him back. Bring Connor back. Please.

44.speaker: Player
44.text: I can't. I don't have the wand anymore.

13.speaker: Mayrina
13.text: Then why are you even here? Damn it.

50.speaker: Player
50.text: Point the wand towards the grave.
